title: Exemption from scrutiny fee :- The amount of scrutiny fee shall be exempted to the extent of 50% of the normal rate for building permission under Integrated Township Project
clause_text: Exemption from scrutiny fee :- The amount of scrutiny fee shall be exempted to the extent of 50% of the normal rate for building permission under Integrated Township Project.
